column4: hi, does somebody know about an UBUNTU compatibility list regarding motherboard ? Thx
if it uses intel or amd, you're probably fine
chipset compatibility no problem amd-64 or core duo... doesn't care?
I'm guess it won't have a problem, i have an AMD Athlon (dual core) on my laptop here ,and my only problem is sometimes my video card and my audio card, which are seperate issues
